Events Saturday & Sunday Brunch Sunday January 18th Sundays and Saturdays every week Brunch is so fabulous at High Cotton, we have to offer it on Sundays AND Saturdays. Enjoy our every weekend! With live music! Brunch Menu 10:00 AM - 02:00 PM

Private Events Our private event rooms offer a unique blend of historic charm and sophisticated elegance. Reclaimed wood floors and exposed brick walls create a warm, inviting atmosphere, while palm leaf fans add a touch of old-world appeal. Our dedicated team is committed to delivering superior service and meticulous attention to detail, ensuring your event is unforgettable. Savor the freshest local catches prepared by our culinary experts, as you and your guests create lasting memories. Please inquire for room fee and food beverage minimum Let Keith Neighbours tell you more at or (843) 724-3815 Call us at 843 724 3815 kneighbours@hallmanagementgroup.com Write us at kneighbours@hallmanagementgroup.com TAKE A LOOK AROUND WITH OUR VIRTUAL TOUR PRIVATE DINING MENUS INQUIRE NOW about event reservation MAIN DINING ROOM Exposed brick, heart pine floors, abundant natural light and views of East Bay Street make the Main Dining Room a casually elegant, purely Charleston space for inspired, one-of-a-kind events. Up to 100 seated, 150 reception Capacity: FRENCH QUARTER ROOM With heart pine floors, beautiful crown, molding, and French doors that open to a patio for al fresco entertaining, the French Quarter room warmly welcomes an array of special events. Up to 60 seated, 80 reception Capacity: EAST BAY ROOM Featuring prime views of the street for which it's named, the East Bay Room boasts fabric-covered walls, sparkling chandeliers, and an ornate fireplace creating a sophisticated, intimate space for brides, business, and partygoers. Up to 30 seated, 40 reception Capacity: PRIVATE DINING MENUS TAKE A LOOK AROUND With our virtual tour INQUIRE NOW about event reservation

Lowcountry Living From conversation and laughter in our bar to our stylish dining rooms of heart pine floors and antique brick, you’ll come to understand true Charleston hospitality. That is, there’s always cause for celebration – of our neighbors, our food and drink and each other. It’s our great pleasure to share it with you. Read more about us Groups & Private Events We welcome every type of private event We look forward to making your event memorable, designed with you in mind. View Our Rooms a private party Our Menus Dedicated To QUALITY Finest Local Ingredients & Freshest Seafood Our menus slideshow start stop playing Slide 1 content Slide 2 content Slide 3 content Slide 4 content previous slide next slide Enjoy our Saturday & Sunday Brunch Brunch menu Private Dining Perfection Learn More about a private party Experience the Magic of Live Music live music Direct From The Ocean To Our Kitchen Our Menus Reservations Book your High Cotton reservation on Resy Skip Photo Gallery Reviews Start stop reviews carousel Review by - Google KB R: five star review by Absolutely amazing restaurant. Food was fresh and excellent . Service was A+ . Highly recommend for seafood . Very nice ambiance. Also nice bar area Review by - Google Tony G: five star review by We loved Brunch at High Cotton. It is a Halls restaurant with great service and a good comfort menu. The burger and the filet Mignon where each excellent. High Cotton is classic and classy. Review by - Google Golden E: five star review by Did not disappoint. That hot skillet cinnamon roll was like manna from heaven. Reservations are must, even for brunch. Review by - Google Evan D: five star review by The sweet potatoe cheesecake was delicious and the side of brussel sprouts was amazing. We thought the crab cakes were good but not great. Loved the live music. Review by - Google Hannah K: five star review by The absolute best meal my fiancé and I have ever had. We've been to several higher end restaurants and we always go back to, "this was good but do you remember high cotton?" Nothing compares.
